alert.note: Alert for Albany; Rensselaer; Saratoga; Schenectady (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 26 at 3:02PM EDT until September 26 at 4:00PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: The National Weather Service in Albany has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Schenectady County in east central New York... Eastern Albany County in east central New York... South central Saratoga County in east central New York... Rensselaer County in east central New York... * Until 400 PM EDT. * At 302 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Feura Bush, or near Delmar, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Albany, Schenectady, Troy, Rotterdam, East Greenbush, Cohoes, Watervliet, Rensselaer, Colonie, Scotia, Nassau, Delmar, Latham, Guilderland, Niskayuna, Menands, Ravena, Stephentown, Voorheesville and Green Island. Please report hail size...damaging winds and reports of trees down to the National Weather Service by email at Alb.Stormreport@noaa.gov... On Facebook at www.facebook.com/nwsalbany or twitter @nwsalbany HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
